blogPost.excerpt: Zepel is the project management software that takes you beyond simple issue tracking. This way, you can plan features, track progress of your entire product development process, and ship customer-focussed software painlessly.
blogPost.body: Zepel is the project management software that takes you beyond simple issue tracking. This way, you can plan features, track progress of your entire product development process, and ship customer-focussed software painlessly.
blogPost.title: Zepel 2.0 - Jira alternative for software product teams
blogPost.author: Vikash Koushik

localize.description: Zepel是一款项目管理软件，它不仅仅是简单的问题跟踪。通过这种方式，您可以规划功能，跟踪整个产品开发过程的进展，并以客户为中心的软件无痛地发货。
localize.tagline: 软件产品团队的Jira替代方案

localize.description: Zepel是一款項目管理軟件，它不僅僅是簡單的問題跟蹤。通過這種方式，您可以規劃功能，跟蹤整個產品開發過程的進展，並以客戶爲中心的軟件無痛地發貨。
localize.tagline: 軟件產品團隊的Jira替代方案

previous.excerpt: Athens is an open-source and local-first alternative to Roam Research. Athens is the most powerful and transparent knowledge graph.
previous.title: Athens Research - Open-source, local-first Roam Research

localize.description: Athens是Roam Research的一个开源和本地优先选择。Athens是最强大、最透明的知识图谱。
localize.tagline: 开放源码、本地优先的漫游研究。

localize.description: Athens是Roam Research的一個開源和本地優先選擇。Athens是最強大、最透明的知識圖譜。
localize.tagline: 開放源碼、本地優先的漫遊研究。
